title: Chocolate fudge cake with chocolate ganache
ingredients: ['For the cake', '125g butter, softened', '225g light muscavado sugar or caster sugar', '3 large eggs', '175g self raising flour', '50g cocoa powder', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '2 tablespoons milk (if needed)', 'For the chocolate ganache', '150ml double cream', '150g plain chocolate (high cocoa content)', 'a little bit of alcohol such as Marsala wine, whisky or brandy']
